/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the city's towering structures. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the urban landscape. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, their facades adorned with advertisements that add a splash of color to the scene. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, are scattered across the street, indicating a busy time of day. Overhead, power lines crisscross against the sky, a common sight in many cities. In the distance, trees can be seen, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting.
